Author: SpiderGwennivere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,490Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: Steph sat down on the couch beside Jason and turned the TV on and began to scroll through movies and shows.“Ah ha! She exclaimed when she found the movie she desired to watch. Jason looked up and saw that it was Tangled.“Well Blondie I think you’re a little on the nose with that one aren’t ya” Jason smiled.“Well I mean I may not be a lost princess, but you do call me Blondie, and I do wear a lot of purple” Steph laughed.“A lot is an understatement,” Jason teased.

entry.title: Of Course They Had Crowbars
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderGwennivere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,865Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: Hi! This is my first Fanfic! The bats had been dealing with an issue at Arkham when a new rogue had decided to appear. Jason had been the only person available to deal with it so he took off as soon as Oracle called him in.The rogue had been a front for a different threat and Jason had fallen into the trap.He was ambushed by five men, armed with guns and..crowbars. Most weapons didn't bother Jason, crowbars were different though. After you've been beaten to death by one, it's hard to shake the association.

entry.title: mall meet-cute
entry.summary:
Author: Tauria

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,554Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 128

Summary: "Wouldn't I look sexy in that?" she says, half-joking as she turns to Tim. Oh. Oh no. That is very much not Tim she’s looking at. Tall and gorgeous flushes a pretty shade of pink, making him look a lot softer than his tough-boy aesthetic might suggest. He looks familiar in a way that tugs at her brain, but she can’t really imagine forgetting a face like his, what with the full lips and long lashes and prominent, slightly crooked nose. Stephanie Brown, you are a walking disaster. Steph meets a hot guy at the mall and scores herself a date—and her picture in the tabloids, but who cares about that?

Summary: 2.5 years after Jason Todd-Smith disappeared and believed dead, and Stephanie Brown has tried to move on, only to get her heart broken again. Trying to distract herself, she goes on patrol more often, and finds herself interested in Gotham’s newest vigilante.There’s only one problem; this new vigilante hates the Bats, and would rather see them dead, along with most of Gotham’s Rogues. entry.title: So, I could hold your hand (but keep you at arm's length)
entry.summary:
Author: duskdawnallen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,572Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 59

Summary: Stephanie shakes her head, but the pressing question is why Jason killed a man for her. She swallows, biting on her bottom lip before turning to face Jason. “Why did you — you know I could’ve handled it.”Jason mulls over his answer and he just shrugs. “I care about you, remember?” Stephanie knows he’s referring to his admission last year. “‘Sides, hitting someone from behind is a cowardly move.”“Yeah, maybe.” She mumbles and she leans her head against Jason’s arm. He tenses at the gesture and then his hand snakes behind her back and rests on her shoulder. “I care about you too, Jase.” OR; Love in Gotham sucks, especially when one of you is considered a Rogue
